com.simsilica.lemur.core

Class GuiControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.control.AbstractControl
      • com.simsilica.lemur.core.AbstractNodeControl<GuiControl>
        • com.simsilica.lemur.core.GuiControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.export.Savable, com.jme3.scene.control.Control, FocusTarget

    public class GuiControl
extends AbstractNodeControl<GuiControl>
implements FocusTarget
    Manages a component stack, the parent/child relationship, and other standard GuiControl functionality.

        public void setFocusable(boolean b)

      • setComponent

        public <T extends GuiComponent> T setComponent(java.lang.String key,
                                      T component)
        Sets a new component to the specified layer and returns THAT component, not the previous value. This is so that it works like addComponent() in that you can set it and grab it at the same time.
